text: @elonmusk Hey Musk, President Obama set up anti-pandemic programs in 47 vulnerable countries, as a way to protect against something just like Coronavirus breaking out across the 🌎 Experts begged Trump to keep them open. He closed 37 of them #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath. https://t.co/cURu6jmnRX
